radiographic_examinations.findings: Minor atelectatic changes at the lung bases, normal heart size without pericardial effusion, prior liver resections with a small amount of simple fluid adjacent to the hepatic dome, atrophic pancreas, bilateral renal cysts, subcentimeter hypodensity in the left kidney, significant bowel wall thickening at the terminal ileum with a few diverticuli and surrounding fat stranding, post-resection changes in the mid-transverse colon and sigmoid colon, normal appendix, heavy atherosclerotic calcifications in the abdominal aorta, no mesenteric or retroperitoneal lymphadenopathy, sigmoid diverticulosis, prostatic calcifications, no free fluid or air in the pelvis, mild multilevel degenerative changes in osseous structures.
